text: Tokyopop, formerly known as Mixx, is an American distributor, licensor and publisher. They work with anime, manga, manhwa and Original English-language manga in English, German, and Japanese. Tokyopop has its headquarters in Los Angeles, California. It has branches in the United Kingdom and Germany. Tokyopop products are available internationally. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Blu Manga imprint website Category:Publishing companies of the United States Category:Companies based in Los Angeles Category:1997 establishments in California
title: Tokyopop
